oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Novel fluorescence emissions from 3-styrylindoles
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, AK
ASEFA, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: solid-state fluorescence
aggregation-induced emission
restricted intramolecular rotation
quinol-type fluorophores
light-emitting-diodes
cis double-bonds
supramolecular interactions
convenient synthesis
luminescence
derivatives
3-styrylindoles
fluorescence
solid state
charge transfer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fluorescence spectral properties of variously substituted 3-styrylindoles viz. 3-(2-phenylethenyl-E)-NH-indole 1, 3-[2-(4-nitrophenyl)ethenyl-E]-NH-indole 2, 5-methoxy-3-[2(4-nitrophenyl)ethenyl-E]-NH-indole 3,3-[2-(4-chlorophenyl)ethenyl-E]-NH-indole 4 and 5-methoxy-3-[2-(4-chlorophenyl)ethenyl-E]-NH-indole 5 in solution and solid-state are described.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 48(11), 1543-1547
